title: Police Kill Man During Drug Operation

title: For Spraying, Calm Words and Criticism

body: Heavy rain and fog thwarted a plan to spray pesticide over much of New York City yesterday, but officials said that they still hoped to spray in every borough by the end of the weekend to curb the recent outbreak of St. Louis encephalitis, a mosquito-borne viral disease. title: Pesticide Spraying Slowed By Heavy Rain and Fog

title: Corrections

title: Spraying Expands in New York Encephalitis Fight

title: NEIGHBORHOOD REPORT: NEW YORK UP CLOSE; Lime Rickey, Drink of Yore
